markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Squirm Free](/Feats.aspx?ID=3355) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 65</row>

**Trigger**
A creature [grabs](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [immobilizes](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), or [restrains](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) you.

</column>

---

You're used to slipping out of a bigger creature's grasp or escaping a child's overly enthusiastic hug. You attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).
name: Squirm Free
